description.h2: The target of an effective relationship with an xlink:arcrole attribute equal to 'http://xbrl.org/int/dim/arcrole/notAll' must not be the target of an effective arc with an xlink:arcrole attribute equal to 'http://xbrl.org/int/dim/arcrole/all' in link:definitionLink elements having the equal values of xlink:role.
description.p: This rule ensures that a Table (hypercube) is not both positive and negative.

REMARK: This rule complements 6.16.7 by ensuring that HC1 and HC2 are distinct. The combination of this constraint, 6.16.4, and XBRL Dimensions 1.0 constraint's prohibition of undirected cycles in HcDim relationships prevents using @targetRole to give the same HC element different members of the same axis.

variation.name: 6.16.8, All and notall arcs with distinct target hypercubes in one link role, GOOD.
variation.description: All and notall arcs with distinct target hypercubes in one link role, GOOD.

variation.name: 6.16.8, All and notall arcs with same target hypercubes in one link role, NOGOOD.
variation.description: All and notall arcs with same target hypercubes in one link role, NOGOOD.
